item.title: CVE-2022-38764|2024-08-03T11:02:14.601Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20housecall%20%28consumer%29
item.description: A vulnerability on Trend Micro HouseCall version 1.62.1.1133 and below could allow a local attacker to escalate privlieges due to an overly permissive folder om the product installer.
